messages.content: Hello, how are you?
I'm good, thank you!
I'm going to share some of my favorite numbers with you now.
What's your favorite number?
Glad to hear it. Here's a bunch of Lorem Ipsum text I found on the internet: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

I like that Lorem Ipsum too. I'm going to go to the store to buy some groceries now.
That's cool, I'll join you.
Let's take my station wagon. It carries lots of stuff.
Great. I want to buy a whole ocean's worth of seafood.
We'll tell 'em to bring out the whole ocean!
I should probably bring a trunkful of ice. To put the seafood on. So it doesn't get hot while we're driving.
Smart thinking. It's going to be hot out there. Weather lady says it's going to be 100 degrees.
Farenheit or Celsius?
Celsius.
...I don't believe you. That's too hot.
I'm not sure what you mean. We live on Mercury. It gets pretty hot.
Oh yeah.. I forgot. We *do* live on Mercury. I'm still getting used to the heat.
Ha ha, it takes a while. Anyways, get your suit on and let's go.
Fish, shipped straight from Earth's ocean! Yippee!
Alright, I'll start the air conditioning in the wagon while you grab your thermal suit.
Good idea. The UV protection on this suit is supposed to be top-notch. Still feels weird wearing it every time we go out.
You'll get used to it. Remember when I first moved here from Earth? I couldn't even walk to the mailbox without overheating.
At least the grocery store has that cool underground section. Keeps the produce fresh and us comfortable.
True! And they just got a new shipment of Earth vegetables yesterday. Want to grab some tomatoes for a salad?
Definitely. Do you think they'll have any of those Earth strawberries? They're so much sweeter than the hydroponic ones.
Maybe, but they're probably expensive. The shipping costs from Earth are astronomical these days.
Worth every credit though. Hey, should we grab some ice cream too? The mercury heat makes me crave something cold.
Smart thinking! They have that new Martian vanilla flavor that everyone's been talking about.
Perfect. Okay, I'm suited up and ready. Let's go before the afternoon heat wave hits!
